short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert speech to text and insert it into the focused input field. It can be in ChatGPT or any other website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert speech to text and insert it into the focused input field. It can be in ChatGPT or any other website. The small icon appears at the bottom right of the page when to click on the extension. You will need to reload the pages after installing the extension to enable this feature. Kindly note that Google Docs are not supported.
